subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams hit 11 of 16 3-point attempts, including an N.B.A.-record nine in the first half, as the Nets cruised past the Wizards.
snippet: Deron Williams hit 11 of 16 3-point attempts, including an N.B.A.-record nine in the first half, as the Nets cruised past the Wizards.
